package.name: UNL_EventPublisher
package.summary: A University Event Calendar & Publishing System
package.description: This package combines three subpackages into one complete University event publishing system.
package.notes:
README: This pseudo package has dependencies for all the sub-packages which make up the UNL Event Publisher.
Dependencies: UNL_UCBCN-0.5.0 UNL_UCBCN_Frontend-0.5.0 UNL_UCBCN_Manager-0.5.0
More info can be obtained at http://pear.unl.edu/ Contact Brett Bieber for more information.

release.notes:
